T02D2996:58a-0: @58a * // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2996:58a-1: rig sngags kyi las chud mi za bar byed pa'i
T02D2996:58a-2: sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas bum pa
T02D2996:58a-4: de la ci 'dod pa'i dbang bskur blangs la bdag
T02D2996:58a-5: nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad la thugs gnyis su
T02D2996:58a-6: med pa'i ye shes rnams bdag la bltas te /
T02D2996:58a-7: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbyibs rnams bdag la bstims la /
T02D2996:58a-8: de nas rang 'dod pa'i lhar dmigs la bsnyen pa
T02D2996:58a-9: 'bum phrag gcig bsgrub pa la 'bum phrag gnyis byas
T02D2996:58a-10: la mchod pa bdag nyid kyis bdag la mchod pa
T02D2996:58a-11: dang / de bzhin du bstod pa dang /
T02D2996:58a-14: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2996:58a-15: bdag dang sems can gyi don rjes su gzung ba rnams bya ste /
T02D2996:58a-16: bum pa'i nang nas kyang mchod pa'i lha mo grangs
T02D2996:58a-17: med pa rnams spros la bdag la mchod pa dang
T02D2996:58a-18: / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu
T02D2996:58a-19: med pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la
T02D2996:58a-20: bdag la rjes su yi rangs shing bstod pa dang
T02D2996:58a-22: mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa rnams kyis kyang bdag
T02D2996:58a-23: gi zhabs spyi gtsug tu len cing /
T02D2996:58a-24: rab tu bstod pa dang 'jig rten la gnas shing
T02D2996:58b-0: @58b 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha dang klu dang gnod
T02D2996:58b-1: sbyin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang bdag la mthu dang gzi brjid dang /
T02D2996:58b-3: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sprul pa'i gzugs grangs med pa sprul te /
T02D2996:58b-4: rdzu 'phrul byin cing ngo mtshar gyi tshogs bshad pa mang por brjod par dmigs la /
T02D2996:58b-5: khams gsum na ji ltar dmigs pa'i mthu rtsal dang /
T02D2996:58b-11: dbang phyug la sogs pa dang bdag ldan par dmigs pa dang /
T02D2996:58b-12: 'das pa'i ye shes dang thams cad mkhyen pa dang
T02D2996:58b-13: de bzhin nyid dang zag pa med pa'i chos nyid
T02D2996:58b-14: thams cad bdag nyid yin par dmigs so //
T02D2996:58b-15: de ltar dmigs pa la rgyud rdzogs par klag pa
T02D2996:58b-16: tshar re zhing rang gi 'dod pa'i gtso bo'i dngos
T02D2996:58b-18: khams gsum gyi bcud bsdus 'das pa'i dpal bsdu'o //
T02D2996:58b-19: de lta bu lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas pas rig sngags sam /
T02D2996:58b-20: gsang sngags kyi 'dod pa'i don gcig 'grub pas lhag
T02D2996:58b-21: ma ma lus par 'grub cing de nyid la zag
T02D2996:58b-22: pa med par longs spyod par nges so //
T02D2996:58b-23: gzungs sngags kyi las grub pa rnams chud mi za
T02D2996:58b-24: bar byed pa rin po che'i gter sgrub ces bya
